cited_protocols.title: GENERATING THE POOLED SINGLE GUIDE RNA LIBRARIES

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d612b","text":"This protocol outlines the production of lentiviral supernatant from a CRISPRi Library plasmid. The plasmid is transfected into HEK293T cells and used for CRISPRi perturbation in both human pluripotent stem cells (hPSCs) and hPSC-derived dopaminergic neural cells. To enhance the viral titer, the virus is concentrated using the Lenti-X concentrator from Takara-Bio following collection of the viral supernatant from HEK 293T cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

documents.ofn: LENTIVIRAL PRODUCTION FOR pCRISPRi dual-guide mDA Neuron Library.docx

keywords: ASAPCRN,Lentiviral Production, CRISPRi machinery, dopaminergic neuron differentiation, Perturb-Seq

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mqrd","text":"Seed HEK 293T cells into T25 flasks in 5ml of HEK culture media at a cell seeding density of 1.5x10^6 cells/flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dlj4c","text":"After 24 hours, check whether the HEK293T cells are at least 60% confluent and proceed with transfection and bring the Opti-MEM to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2r8u6","text":"In TUBE A, mix the following reagents. Make this volume of reagent per T25 flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"415oq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8v0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4g30","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4k59e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["121","121"],"data":[["TUBE A","AMOUNT IN ul"],["Lipofectamine 3000","15 "],["Opti-MEM","235"],["Total","250"]],"guid":"F670B47F19164BF795B05E5085ADB966","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["TUBE A","AMOUNT IN ul"],["Lipofectamine 3000","15 "],["Opti-MEM","235"],["Total","250"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"envt6","text":"In TUBE B, mix the following reagents. Make this volume of reagent per T25 flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25sa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"895mj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vcu7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aa8rq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7s3k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold _dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_6":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_7":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["126","142"],"data":[["TUBE B","AMOUNT"],["psPAX2","4ug"],["VSV-G","2ug"],["pCRISPRi dual-guide mDA Neuron Library","4ug"],["P3000","20ul"],["Opti-MEM","X ul"],["Total","250 ul"]],"guid":"C7A4573AEA464F86A019BF150754A2DB","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["TUBE B","AMOUNT"],["psPAX2","4ug"],["VSV-G","2ug"],["pCRISPRi dual-guide mDA Neuron Library","4ug"],["P3000","20ul"],["Opti-MEM","X ul"],["Total","250 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7iifs","text":"Transfer tube B contents to tube A, mix gently by pipetting and incubate for 10 mins at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hho9","text":"Replace the media in the T25 flask with fresh 5 ml of HEK culture media during incubation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84h42","text":"Add the whole mix (~500ul) gently, drop by drop, making sure to cover the entire area of the T25 flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ro0f","text":"Gently swirl the media in the flask to ensure the proper distribution of the packaging mixture, and incubate the flask in the incubator for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f35eq","text":"After 24 hours, aspirate the media and gently add 5 ml of fresh HEK culture media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afs6f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bhkrh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"u8o2","text":"Caution: HEK293T cells tend to lift off easily, so be extremely careful while changing the media and add the media on the opposite wall of the flask where the cells are not attached.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"CC61AB9DC50C49108A02901E17F5991E"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8kagp","text":"Return the flask to the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9g2ib","text":"Harvest the lentivirus-containing supernatant into 15 ml tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"qp41","text":"Centrifuge the supernatant at 500 g for 10 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"183h","text":"Transfer the clarified supernatant (5 ml) into a sterile 15 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fbeib","text":"Depending on the volume of the supernatant, combine 1 volume of Lenti-X Concentrator with 3 volumes of clarified supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38k1m","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ia8h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m5cm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vch2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["146","130"],"data":[["VOLUME OF CLARIFIED SUPERNATANT","VOLUME OF CONCENTRATOR"],["x = 5 ml","x/3 = 1.6 ml"]],"guid":"4029473C7A2C442D8D6E9E39EB04D895","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["VOLUME OF CLARIFIED SUPERNATANT","VOLUME OF CONCENTRATOR"],["x = 5 ml","x/3 = 1.6 ml"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a9p69","text":"Mix by gentle inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 3: Harvesting the supernatant and concentrating the virus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"p8a6","text":"Incubate mixture overnight at 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86l7o","text":"Centrifuge the concentrated virus at 1500g for 45 mins at 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8isbh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3gqqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6g25a","text":"After the centrifugation, an off-white pellet will be visible.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"4AE72DBCEC684F6B948F494740634D53"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at22d","text":"Carefully remove the supernatant without disturbing the pellet. The residual supernatant can be removed with a pipette tip or by brief centrifugation at 1500g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12cf2","text":"Gently resuspend the pellet in 1/10th of the original volume (500ul) with DMEM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5gfv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bac2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"57tj0","text":"The pellet will be sticky at first but will suspend quickly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0AA31B6107A6457D873F296503B85084"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rmfr","text":"Detailed protocol for concentration for the virus can be found in this link: Lenti-X™ Concentrator Protocol-at-a-Glance","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":42}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9B08DD3ABCCE489D8FFA595F33AB0187","url":"https://www.takarabio.com/documents/User%20Manual/Lenti/Lenti-X%20Concentrator%20Protocol-At-A-Glance.pdf"}}}}
